title: HDF5 delayed array
description: Delayed array saved in a group of a HDF5 file as an n-dimensional dataset. This follows the [**chihaya**](https://ltla.github.io/chihaya) specification for delayed operations, based on the [**DelayedArray**](https://bioconductor.org/packages/DelayedArray) Bioconductor package.

group.description: Name of the group containing the delayed array.
